async.title: Non-strict mode (async)
async.description: By activating this option, quota is applied in an asynchronous way meaning that the distributed counter value is not strict.

addHeaders.title: Add response headers
addHeaders.description: Add X-Quota-Limit, X-Quota-Remaining and X-Quota-Reset headers in HTTP response

key.title: Key
key.description: Key to identify a consumer against whom the quota will be applied. Leave it empty to use the default behavior (plan/subscription pair). Supports EL.

limit.title: Max requests (static)
limit.description: Static limit on the number of requests that can be sent (this limit is used if the value > 0).

dynamicLimit.title: Max requests (dynamic)
dynamicLimit.description: Dynamic limit on the number of requests that can be sent (this limit is used if static limit = 0). The dynamic value is based on EL expressions.
